root.name: arch
tip: Show if node is running in 32 or 64 bit mode.
Set the default running state to 32bit mode.
Set the default running state to 64bit mode.

root.name: debug
tip: Check the NVM4W process for known problems (troubleshooter)

next.name: latest
tip: Install the latest version of node.

options.name: --insecure
tip: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server.

next.name: lts
tip: Install the lts version of node.

options.name: --insecure
tip: Bypass SSL validation of the remote download server.

root.name: node_mirror
tip: Leave [url] blank to use default url.

root.name: proxy
tip: Set a proxy to use for downloads.
Leave [url] blank to see the current proxy
Set [url] to "none" to remove the proxy.

root.name: root
tip: Set the directory where nvm should store different versions of node.js.
If <path> is not set,  the directory where node.js is currently stored will be displayed.

root.name: uninstall
tip: Uninstall the specified version of node.

root.name: use
tip: Switch to use the specified version.

root.name: version
tip: Displays the current running version of nvm.

options.name: --version
tip: Displays the current running version of nvm.
